titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of Qatar of certain defense articles and services.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed export to the Government of Qatar of certain defense articles and services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the offer to sell to Qatar advanced medium range air-to-air missiles and various related parts and software, as outlined in the certification Transmittal No. 18-43 that was sent to Congress on November 28, 2018.
